org.tmotte.tmplz.load.builtin

Class ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tmotte.tmplz.load.builtin.URLTextLoaderFactory
      • org.tmotte.tmplz.load.builtin.ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextLoaderFactory

    public class ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory
extends URLTextLoaderFactory
    Loads content from the Java "class path", specifically any ClassLoader. Since this class extends URLTextLoaderFactory, it resolves relative URL's just like its parent.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.Class c)
      Invokes ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(c.getClassLoader(), "", false).
      ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Invokes ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(classLoader, "", false).
      ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader, java.lang.String prePath)
      Invokes ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(classLoader, "", false).
      ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader, java.lang.String prePath, boolean enableBrokenZipFix) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextLoader create(Path path)
      If path.hasURL() returns true, this method returns a URLTextLoader.
      java.net.URL getURL(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String prePath, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory

        public ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                    java.lang.String prePath,
                                    boolean enableBrokenZipFix)
        Parameters:
        classLoader - A classLoader that has template files in its classpath. In many cases this can simply be this.getClassLoader() for the object invoking the constructor, or even new Object().getClassLoader().
        prePath - This will prepended to any Path passed to create() if Path.hasPathString() returns true. If not needed, use "" or null.
        enableBrokenZipFix - Enables a "temporary" hack/fix for java's inability (as of version 7) to resolve relative URL's using URL's in zip/jar/war files via URI.resolve(). Required by ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory.

      • ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory

        public ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                    java.lang.String prePath)
        Invokes ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(classLoader, "", false).

      • ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory

        public ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Invokes ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(classLoader, "", false).

      • ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory

        public ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(java.lang.Class c)
        Invokes ClassLoaderTextLoaderFactory(c.getClassLoader(), "", false).

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public TextLoader create(Path path)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        If path.hasURL() returns true, this method returns a URLTextLoader. Otherwise, this creates a URL using ClassLoader.getResource() and returns a URLTextLoader that loads from that URL.
        Specified by:
        create in interface TextLoaderFactory
        Overrides:
        create in class URLTextLoaderFactory
        Returns:
        If path.hasURL() returns true, a URLTextLoader is created with path.getURL(). If path.hasPathString() returns true, the "prePath" value passed to the constructor ("" by default) will be prepended to path.getPathString(), and new URL(String) will be invoked with it.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getURL

        public java.net.URL getURL(java.lang.String path,
                           java.lang.String prePath,
                           java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Can be overridden for extra functionality.
